abstract: Even as some big hedge funds have returned outside investors’ money, the industry as a whole has seen capital levels rebound from the lows of a few years ago.
snippet: Even as some big hedge funds have returned outside investors’ money, the industry as a whole has seen capital levels rebound from the lows of a few years ago.
lead_paragraph: We have all heard about big hedge fund managers returning outside investors’ money: Chris Shumway, Stanley Druckenmiller and, more lately, Carl C. Icahn. While the news may seem grim, the industry as a whole has seen capital levels rebound from the lows of a few years ago.

headline.main: As Big Names Shut Down, Smaller Funds Step Up
